msbt.message: I do so hate to be nosy, darling. Still, I feel we'd be so much closer if only we knew one another better.
It's important for each of us here on the island to get to know one another better, don't you think? It'll help bring us together, darling. I'm sure of it.
In fact, there's something I'd like to ask you, if you don't mind
Didn't you tell me the other day that, of all the out there, you love the most? Is that still true, ?
So, you know how I like to gab.Well, I might have mentioned to that you're all about . I'm so glad I didn't pass along incorrect information.
Didn't you tell me once that, of all the out there, you love most? Is that still true, ?
So, you know how I get to talking sometimesWell, I might have mentioned to that you're all about . I'm so glad I didn't pass along incorrect information.
Remember how we talked about your all-time favorite , ? Dear me. You were ALL about , if I remember correctly.
Well, that's good news!You see, and I were chitchatting about our fave when you came up. I might have mentioned that you absolutely love .I'm relieved I didn't spread any false rumors, .
Remember how we talked about your all-time favorite , ? Dear me. You were ALL about , if I remember correctly.
Well, that's good news!You see, and I were chitchatting about our fave when you came up. I might have mentioned that you absolutely love . I'm relieved I didn't spread any false rumors, .
Do you remember when you confided in me the other day? About your dream job, I mean. I'm curiousare you still in love with the idea of becoming , ?

Excellent. That's good to hear.You see, I was talking about dream jobs with the other day when you came up. I hope you don't mind, but I might have mentioned your desire to become .I'm pleased you're still chasing that dream. After all, I'd hate to be the source of incorrect gossip.
Do you remember when you confided in me? About your dream job, I mean You said was what you most wanted to be, isn't that right, ?

Excellent. That's good to hear.You see, I was talking about dream jobs with the other day when you came up. I hope you don't mind, but I might have mentioned your goal. I'm pleased you're still chasing that dream. After all, I'd hate to be the source of incorrect gossip.
If I remember correctly, you're passionate about . Ehis that right?

I think that's a wonderful hobby. And couldn't agree more, . We were chatting about hobbies, you see. One thing led to another, andI might have spilled the beans about your love of . I do hope I didn't reveal too much. Well, my dear, at least I didn't say you were collector or some such.
If I remember, you're passionate about . Ehis that right?

I think that's a wonderful hobby. And couldn't agree more, . We were chatting about hobbies, you see. One thing led to another, andI spilled the beans about your love for . I do hope I didn't reveal too much. Well, at least I didn't say you were collector or some such.
Darling, do you remember how you told me that you're quite good at ? Yes, well, that IS still the case, isn't it?

Well, THAT'S a relief, .You see, I was telling about the MANY highly talented folks I know And, well, I might have mentioned you and your talent for . Oh, fine. I confess I was bragging. Which is why I'm glad I remembered correctly. I can't have thinking I was making things up, now can I?
Darling, do you remember how you told me that you're quite good at ? Yes, well, that IS still the case, isn't it?

Well, THAT'S a relief, .You see, I was telling about the MANY highly talented folks I knowAnd, well, I might have mentioned you and your talent for . Oh, fine. I confess I was bragging. Which is why I'm glad I remembered correctly. I can't have thinking I was making things up, now can I?
Now, , I need you to be honest with me
I heard a rumor that, when it comes to , you are a huge fan of . Is that true, ?
Wonderful! I, too, have been known to enjoy , believe it or not. Needless to say, I would be happy to discuss with you anytime, my dear.
Fascinating. . I would not have guessed that was your thing, darling. I do love learning new tidbits about my neighbors. We really should gab about this more sometime.
I heard a rumor that, when it comes to , you are a huge fan of . Is that true, ?
Wonderful! I, too, have been known to enjoy on occasion. Of course, I would be happy to discuss with you anytime, my dear.
. Fascinating. I would not have guessed that was your thing. I do love learning new tidbits about my neighbors. We really should gab about this more, my dear.
I heard a little rumor, darling, and it goes like thisYou love above all other .But tell me, is this tidbit of culinary gossip true, ?
You, my dear, have excellent taste. I, too, simply adore . It's not often I meet someone with a palate as refined as mine.Let's be sure to discuss our mutual appreciation for as soon as possible.
Hmm. Fascinating. I'm curious what it is about you find so appealing. You really must explain it to me sometime, .
I heard a little rumor, darling, and it goes like thisYou love above all other . It's your absolute favorite.But tell me, is this tidbit of culinary gossip even remotely true, ?

You, my dear, have excellent taste. Believe it or not, I, too, simply adore . It's not often I meet someone with a palate as refined as mine.Let's discuss our mutual appreciation for as soon as possible.
Fascinating. I'm curious what it is about you find so appealing. You really must explain it to me sometime, .
You know, I heard that you dream of becoming Is that still true, ?
that's lovely, my dear, and a very worthy goal. As you make your dream come true, I'll be right here cheering you on!
Well, I can't say I know how one goes about achieving that dream, but I'm rooting for you.
I've heard THAT is your dream job.We all have aspirations, darling, but is that still what you long to be?
That's lovely, my dear, and a worthy goal.I, for one, have no doubt you'll make a fabulous .
Well, I can't say I know how one goes about achieving that dream, but I'm rooting for you.
I heard a little rumor that your hobby is . Is that true? You can tell me.
I LOVE that you love !It's justso very you, . And that is just so very fabulous.
I confess, I've been curious about lately.I don't know much about it, but if you like it, then surely it's worth learning more about, .
I heard a little rumor that your hobby is .Is that really true? You can tell me.
I can't say I'm surprised you enjoy .It's justso very you, . And that is just so very fabulous.
I confess, I've been curious about lately.I don't know much about it, but if you like it, then surely it's worth learning more about, .
Well now! Do you know what I heard? I heard that YOU are exceptionally good at . You must tell me, is that true, ?
is such a fabulous skill to have, darling!You must demonstrate this talent of yours for me sometime.
What I wouldn't give to be able to say that I was good at . Ah well. can dream, I suppose.
Well now! Do you know what I heard? I heard that YOU are exceptionally good at . You must tell me, is that true, ?
is such a fabulous skill to have, darling!You must demonstrate this talent of yours for me sometime.
What I wouldn't give to be able to say that I was good at . Ah well. can dream, I suppose.
I heard a rumor that you, my dear, do not listen to music. AT ALL. Is thistrue?
It's not true now. No. That's not right.
Darling, I hear tell that you do not enjoy reading. Not even magazines!Tell me, is this really true?
It's not true now. No. That's not right.
I understand that you do not read comics. Is this true?
It's not true now. No. That's not right.
I heard the strangest rumor. It seems you do NOT watch movies. AT ALL. Darling, is this really true?
It's not true now. No. That's not right.
What's this I hear about you not watching TV shows AT ALL? Is this true?
It's not true now. No. That's not right.
I hear that you don't care much for sports. You don't play them or watch them, I'm told. Is this true? You can tell me, my dear.
It's not true now. No. That's not right.
I heard a silly little rumor. Apparently YOU do not have a favorite drink. Is this true? Do tell!
It's not true now. No. That's not right.
I heard the strangest rumor, darling. I'm told you do NOT have a favorite food! Is this true?
It's not true now. No. That's not right.
I'm not one to judge, my dear, but I hear you don't have a dream job you're working toward. Is thistrue? You can tell me.
It's not true now. No. That's not right.
I'm not one to judge, my dear, but I hear you don't have a hobby. Not even one! Is thistrue? You can tell me.
It's not true now. No. That's not right.
Now, I'm not one to judge, darlingBut I heard that you feel you don't have any skills worth telling folks about. Is this really true?
It's not true now. No. That's not right.
Ah. I see. I was surprised to hear it, is all. So I thought it best to ask you directly.But never you mind my meddlesome questions. You do you, .
Oh dear! Really?! I suppose I should know better than to listen to rumors.
Hmm. Did I hear that right?
Yep. That's right. You got it.
No. That's not it. Wait a second...
No pressure, darling. Slow down and tell me one more time.
Ah! So you DO dream of becoming . I had it right.
Ah! So IS your hobby. I had it right.
Ah! So you are especially skilled at . I had it right.
Oh, come now! That puts us right back where we started, .I apologize if you felt ambushed. I AM a bit nosy But only because I want to get to know you better.
What is your favorite type of music, ? I'm dying to know!
Oh, really? Your tastes have changed? What kind of music do you like now?
Care to tell me what kind of music you like now?
I, too, listen to classical music!The elegant timbre of the instrumentsthe gorgeous melodiesit's so very me. I just knew we had a lot in common. We're like two notes in a song, .
I thought you might be the jazz type, . And I was right!I like to listen to jazz when I'm home alone at night. It lulls me right to sleep.

Ah, choral musicso lovely Do you, by chance, sing choral music as well as listen to it? I'm more of a soloist myself, but I just love the sound of all those voices coming together. Sometimes the harmonies are so gorgeous they give me the chills, .
So that's what everyone is into these days. ! Who knew?! Seeing how you're so fond of it perhaps I should give it a listen.I'm ALL about listening to the latest music trends, .
You don'tlisten to music? Erm I seeYou know what, good for you! One mustn't waste one's time doing things one doesn't want to do. Even if that thing is listening to musicI suppose.
What kind of books do you read? I'm really quite interested, .
Ah, so your tastes have changed?! What kind of books do you enjoy now?
Can you tell me what kind of books you do enjoy?

Why, I read magazines too! Fashion Cosmetics Travel Knitting Scrapbooking In fact, I just picked up a wonderful magazine about , if you can believe it. Fascinating stuff. You really should check it out, .

Essays are wonderful, aren't they? They're just so thought provoking.I've written a few myself, you know. You've probably heard of them"Nail Polish Nightmares: So You've Decided to Try Orange (Again)?""To Mock or Not to Mock: Deconstructing a Fashion Fail."And last but not least "The Trouble with Trousers: Explains." Heady stuff indeed, .

You like to readdictionaries?Ehdo you begin with "A" and work your way through the alphabet? Or do you just flip to a random page? I look things up in dictionaries all the time, but I've never considered reading through one! Well, , I'm sure it's veryinformative.
Ah! So THAT'S what everyone is reading these days? , eh?Perhaps I should give it a try. I wouldn't want to miss out on a literary fad, you know. I appreciate the hot tip, .
Eh, what do you do with all the time you spendNOT reading books? Dear me, I am curious. Anyhoo, it's fine if books are not your cup of tea. To each their own, .
What kind of comics do you read? I confess, I'm terribly curious, !
Your tastes have changed, have they? Wellwhat kind of comics do you enjoy now?
Can you tell me what kind of comics you enjoy reading now?

Horror?! Why, I never expected YOU'D be the type to enjoy a good fright. Don't tell meyou read these comics in bed with the covers pulled up over your head! That's the only way I could do it, darling. Scary stories like that make my heart race!

I love romantic comedies! Sometimes when I'm feeling blue, I'll pick one up from the bookstore. I swear, the minute I begin turning the pages, I start to cheer right up!There's nothing like a bit of love and laughter to turn one's day around.

Mystery? With detectives and such? Tell me, do you like solving puzzles and figuring out whodunit? I certainly do! I'm always trying to figure out who committed the crime before I get to the end of the story. I'm almost always right too! You know, , sometimes I think I missed my true calling. "Detective at your service!" It has quite the ring to it, no?
Hmm So THAT'S the kind of comics everyone's reading these days. , eh? Well then, I must give them a try. I am NOT the sort of who misses out on a hot trend, you know!
Not your cup of tea, eh?<10_4 /> That's just fine. To each their own, as they say.
I must know What is your favorite kind of movie, ?
Your tastes have changed, have they? Wellwhat kind of movies do you enjoy now?
Care to tell me what kind of movies you do enjoy?

Really?! You? It's justI never expected that you'd be the kind to go in for that sort of thing. You must be a secret thrill seeker, darling. How else could you sit through a horror movie? Hmmmaybe you should take me with you next time you go.Perhaps I could make it through one if you were there with me, .

Romance movies are wonderful, aren't they!Every time I watch one, I find myself swept up in the story.I imagine that I am the leading lady and it is MY heart that's on the line It's silly, of course. But I can't help that I'm such a romantic, .
What a coincidence! I, too, enjoy musicals!The music! The dancing! It lifts one's spirits, no?In fact, there was a time I thought I might go into musical theater. My voice is quite good, you know.

HmmI think I read somewhere that everyone has gone gaga over this type of movie. Honestly, I don't know much about But if YOU think it's worth checking out, then I shall certainly give it a go.I do like to keep my finger on the pulse of what's what, you know.
Really?! That's quiteunusual, is it not?Not to worry, there's no judgment here. I'm sure you fill your time with many other worthy endeavors.
What I'm dying to know is what kind of TV shows do you enjoy, ?
Your tastes have changed, have they? Wellwhat kind of TV shows do you enjoy now?
What kind of TV show do you enjoy? Please. Enlighten me.
Oooh, I love dramas too! I can't help but binge-watch one after another.All those dramatic ups and downs It's like taking a ride on a roller coaster. An emotional roller coaster, that is.

Good answer, my dear. I just love how worldly you are.Every time I watch a travel show, I get a terrible case of wanderlust.There are so many fascinating places to visit, and I want to jet-set my way across each and every one of them!

I had no idea you were so in tune with current affairs! Very mature of you, my dear. News programs are a good way to stay up-to-date on all the important happenings. One mustn't stick one's head in the sand, even if one IS an ostrich.
Yes, I think I read somewhere that makes for some binge-worthy TV. I suppose I'll have to give it a try. I love to get wrapped up in good television programs, after all.

Ehthey don't watch TV? What on earth should I say to that? Think, , THINK! You know what? That's perfectly fine! Who cares if everyone else watches television and you do not You have a mind of your own and that's what I love about you.
Do you have a favorite sport? One you enjoy watching, or perhaps playing? I'm so curious!
You've changed your mind? Wellwhat kind of sport do you enjoy, then?
Care to tell me what kind of sport you like, then?

Ah yes. Golf. I've played a bit myself, you know. Such a refined sport.With each swing, one must pay attention to the smallest of details. Grip. Posture. Angle. Speed. And there's nothing like walking the fairway, contemplating each shot.It's a cerebral game, my dear, which is why you and I are so well suited for it.

A thrilling sport, indeed. I especially love the way the players face off across the net. Such focus! Such intensity! Such determination!I get that same look on my face when I'm about to walk into a big shoe sale.

Oh! You enjoy table tennis, do you?The way that ball bounces back and forth between the playersit moves so fast I can hardly keep track of it! You, my dear, must have a sharp mind and quick reflexes. Two good things to have here on the island.
Hmm So THAT'S the sporting trend everyone is into these days. , eh? Well, if you're into it, darling, it must be exciting. Perhaps I'll look into it myself.
That's perfectly fine, my dear. Sports are not for everyone.I, for one, do NOT enjoy perspiring. So I can totally understand where you're coming from.
What is your VERY favorite drink? I'd love to know, .
Oh! You've changed your mind? Wellwhat IS your favorite drink, then?
Sowould you mind telling me what kind of drink IS your favorite?

I'm so very pleased to hear that black tea is, well, your cup of tea!The rich aroma of a fine black tea brewing in the potnothing makes me happier. Perhaps we could have a little tea party sometime soon.
Ah yes. There's nothing quite so refreshing as a tall glass of lemonade!Why, just thinking about it is making me thirsty for some!

Ah yes, excellent choice. Smoothies are both healthy AND fashionable. I mean, anyone who knows anything about trends knows that smoothies are THE hot drink right now. Though, of course, they're actually served cold. Oh, you know what I mean, darling.
Hmm I don't think I've ever tried it. , eh?Well, if YOU like it, I have no choice but to give it a go. You are quite the tastemaker, after all.
Undiscerning, are we? Isn't that charming.I tell you, it is SO hard to find folks who aren't picky these days. Bravo for you, !
I'm dying to know what your favorite food is, . You simply must tell me.
Oh! You've changed your mind? Wellwhat IS your favorite food right now?
Care to tell me what kind of food IS your favorite now?

Ah, of course. Pasta is a favorite food the world over. And so delicious!Though one must be careful when eating spaghetti, .Twirling those long noodles onto one's fork and lifting them all the way to one's mouth Well, let's just say it's a good way to end up wearing your dinner, rather than eating it.

Ah yes, sushi! A divine choice! I'm partial to it myself, you know.Though I'm not sure which I enjoy moreWatching a chef prepare the sushi in front of me, or having it delivered to me on a conveyor belt? Both have their charms, no?

Ah yes. A perfectly prepared fruit parfait is a bit like a beautiful painting, isn't it? Layer upon layer of gorgeous color teases the eye and pulls the viewer in I swear, sometimes they look almost too pretty to eat!I said ALMOST, darling.
Hmm I don't think I've ever tried it. , eh? I wonder, would I like it?Of course, if YOU like it, I have no choice but to give it a try. You are quite the tastemaker, after all.
I understand completely. With so many tasty options to choose from, why pick only one? Your open-mindedness is admirable, .
I can't help but wonder, what is your dream job?Surely someone like you must have grand ambitions, .
Oh! Your dream job has changed, has it? Wellwhat do you aspire to be now?
Care to tell me what your dream career is, then?

Fabulous choice, darling. Acting is a noble profession.I've done a bit myself, you know. In the theater, of course.I can still feel the warmth of the spotlight on my face and hear the roar of the standing ovations Anyhoo, you'll make a splendid actor, my dear. Just get out there and break a leg!

A scientist! I'm not surprised one bit. From the moment I met you I knew you were one smart cookie. I have no doubt you'll make groundbreaking scientific discoveries one day. And you're going to look absolutely smashing in a lab coat too.
Of COURSE you want to be a doctor!Healing people. Fighting disease. Making the world a better place. That is SO you, darling. You WILL make a wonderful doctor one day. I believe in you.

That's your dream job?
Fascinating. I had no idea. Well, I hope you achieve your goal, darling. I'll be right here cheering you on the whole way!

Now, don't you worry. It's perfectly normal not to have a dream job.There are SO many interesting professions out there, why must you settle on one? I say, DON'T settle on one! Follow your heart and try them all if that's what you want to do! Now that I think about it, perhaps I should consider a career as a career counselor.
Do you have a hobby? You know, something that truly inspires you, ?
Oh! You have a new hobby now? What is it? I'm so curious!
Well thenwhat IS your hobby, if you don't mind my asking?

How much time do you spend on the internet each day? Do tell! I won't judge. Personally, I just don't know where the time goes!One minute I'm reading up on the latest lipstick trends, the next I'm watching celebrity videos. And before I know it, half a day has flown by! But surely you do a better job restraining yourself, my dear.

Isn't that lovely, ! Strength training is SUCH a healthy hobby. Surely it won't be long before you'll be strong enough to do bicep curls with Timmy and Tommy. My goodness, they'll make the most adorable dumbbells!

Making pottery! What a sophisticated hobby you have, .The earthy smell of the claythe feel of it taking shape in your hands the glow one feels upon finishing I'm so pleased to find someone who appreciates the finer points of making pottery as much as I do.
What a lovely hobby, my dear. Very impressive indeed.Hmm You know, I've been wanting to pick up a new pastime myself You may have just given me the inspiration I needed!
I see nothing wrong with not having a hobby. And don't let anyone tell you otherwise. But do tell me if you stumble upon something that grabs your interest. I could use some inspiration myself.
You seem like the talented sort. Do you have any special skills? Do tell, !
Oh! You have a new skill now? You're so talented, I'm not surprised. But what is it? I must know!
Soif you don't mind my asking, what is your special skill, then?

Oooh! What a unique skill you have, darling. And one that must come in handy quite often! I'm no good at memorization, but if I wereI'd memorize the name of every fashion designer ever! It would make it SO much easier to name-drop them when talking style trends with my fashionista friends.

Oooh la la! C'est magnifique! Speaking foreign languages is a wonderful skill to have! I, too, speak a foreign language. It's called Latin.I daresay it's one of the more beautiful languages. Perhaps I can teach you someday, .

What a coincidence! I, too, count drawing among my skills.In fact, I'm quite good at drawing caricatures. It's true, , it's true!You'll just have to model for me sometime. I promise I won't make your nose or ears look too ridiculous.

That's your special skill
Fascinating. I had no idea. You just never know what special talents your friends and neighbors might have tucked inside them. Thank you so much for telling me, my dear.
No special skill? I find THAT hard to believe.Perhaps you just haven't discovered what it is yetor perhaps you're just being modest. That's alright. You can tell me when you're ready, .
